summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1165, for the improvement of Eleventh Avenue Northeast from East Jefferson Street to East Forty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer, wyes, openings, manholes, lamp holes, flush tanks, catch basins, and other appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 12934, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
